Improve this doc View source

authService
service in module app

Description

authService

A factory to authenticate user access and save their credentials to the ongoing session.

Methods

  • login(user)

    Cleans up the user input and passes the user credentials to the getUser method.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    userObject
    • User email and password.
    Returns
    Object

    Promised object from the login api.

  • logout()

    Logs the user out by destroying the session and redirecting to the home page.
